hero.name: Antonio Ramos.
hero.subtitle: I build digital experiences for the web.
hero.description: I'm a frontend developer specialized in creating accessible, pixel-perfect digital experiences. Currently, I'm focused on building accessible and inclusive products at

paragraphs.intro: Hello! My name is Antonio and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2012 when I decided to try editing custom Tumblr themes ‚Äî turns out hacking together HTML & CSS taught me a lot about web development!
paragraphs.experience: Fast-forward to today, and I've had the privilege of working at an advertising agency, a start-up, a huge corporation, and a digital product studio. My main focus these days is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences at a variety of companies.
paragraphs.technologies: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

contact.title: What's Next?
contact.heading: Get In Touch
contact.description: Although I'm not currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
